column2: "Aha, so you return! I have been waiting! You have brought what I was looking for, haven't you?"
"Oh, the anticipation is too much! I can scarcely imagine how wonderful it must be! Please, you must show it to me right away!"
"...Ohhh! This dazzling light! Shiny Soul is more radiant than I could have expected! I feel as though the light is drawing me in..."
"And yet... being bathed in such a strong light makes my golden body seem almost dull... Yes, I see! To achieve true brilliance, one's body and one's soul must be in harmony!"

"Thank you, kind stranger! You have helped me realize an important truth, and for that deed...
I see now that the name \"Shiny Soul\" truly belongs to you!"
